hints.content:
$\blueD{615}$ is the smallest whole number that rounds to $620$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A vertical number line labeled 610 to 630 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 610, 615, 620, and 630 are labeled. The tick mark for 615 is blue. !

hints.content:
$\blueD{624}$ is the greatest whole number that rounds to $620$.

[[☃ image 1]]

So, any whole number from $\blueD{615}$ to $\blueD{624}$ rounds to $620$.

options.alt: A vertical number line labeled 610 to 630 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 610, 615, 620, 624, and 630 are labeled. The tick marks for 615 and 624 are blue. !

A vertical number line labeled 610 to 630 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 610, 615, 620, 624, and 630 are labeled. The tick marks for 615 and 624 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 615 to the tick mark at 624. !

question.content:
**Which number line highlights all whole numbers that round to $620$ if we are rounding to the nearest ten?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A vertical number line labeled 610 to 630 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 610, 615, 620, 624, and 630 are labeled. The tick marks for 615 and 624 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 615 to the tick mark at 624.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ca969971387ccf00d66361ea93c4def9f64b70d8)

![A vertical number line labeled 610 to 630 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 610, 620, 624, and 630 are labeled. The tick marks for 610 and 624 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 610 to the tick mark at 624.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/cefad339f2402bed9de824b6e4c673a650742206)

![A vertical number line labeled 610 to 630 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 610, 620, and 630 are labeled. The tick marks for 620 and 630 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 620 to the tick mark at 630.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/03835efd907a80fd35bb9470bf0ceedab2baf179)
